room_title: Escape room "Last Kill & Testament " by Escape Point in Murfreesboro
room_address: 855 W College St, Suite M, Murfreesboro, TN 37129
room_description:
For over two decades, a serial killer has been kidnapping, torturing, and murdering those he deems unworthy of life. Most of his victims have been heirs of a large inheritance, earning him the name of…

The Testament Killer.

After two decades of flawless execution, a mistake is made. The Testament Killer leaves behind DNA evidence in a mask. Knowing it is the end, the Testament Killer livestreams a suicide just as a news story breaks with his identity.

Upon recognizing the name TTK as one of your neighbors, you and your friends decide to break into his home to try to find the money he took from his victims before the police arrive. But be careful… True evil never dies.
